SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into contract_detail (contract_id, service_id, service_name, service_name_en, fee, create_time, update_time) values (#{contractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update contract_detail set contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_name = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_name_en = #{serviceNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, contract_id, service_id, service_name, service_name_en, fee, create_time, update_time from contract_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, contract_id, service_id, service_name, service_name_en, fee, create_time, update_time from contract_detail
